name: 5dim_mining
title: 5Dim's mod - New Mining
author: 5Dim
description:
Mining for 5dim's mod
Extracts all kind of resources at high productivity also obtain water from everywhere.
This mod include:
- 10 tiers of electric mining drills
- 10 tiers of pumpjack
- 10 tiers of water pumpjack, that allow to extract water on the ground
- 10 tiers of offshore pumps
